title: With an Airwheel mini mobility self balancing skateboard, Never Walk Home Alone
text: With an Airwheel mini mobility self balancing skateboard, Never Walk Home Alone Now there is one kind of new APP, which together with an Airwheel electric scooter could effectively address this problem to some extent. USA, 12 October 2015 -- Traveling alone in the evening is always regarded as a troublesome thing for many people in terms of the issue of safety."Text me when you get home" is a frequent farewell among friends and family. But what if people could actually track their journey home, check in if they're feeling unsafe on their commute, and ensure that they can easily contact the police in an emergency?Now there is one kind of new APP, together with an Airwheel electric scooter which could effectively address this problem to some extent. This new APP is able to monitor the traveling track while an Airwheel self-balancing scooter is able to accompany the rider better. That's all possible with a free app called Companion. Created over a year ago by a group of five students at the University of Michigan, the app has been gaining a ton of momentum after launching to the public two weeks ago. Since this APP is gaining a promising future and appeal to the core concept of safety for Airwheel. It is highly possible for Airwheel rider to install it into oneâ€™s own intelligent self-balancing scooter and enhance the sense of safety. Safety is the eternal target for Airwheel Technology, and until now every product of Airwheel electric scooter adopts the four-fold protections, which includespeed limit protection, low battery protection, tilting protection, altogether safeguarding the rider during journey. Now Companion is regarded as an innovation of technology and Airwheel always keeps close eyes on technology innovation and development, changing itself unceasingly in order to provide the best intelligentelectric self-balancing scooter in the market.No wonder the customers always hear fresh news from Airwheel and the recent technology outcomes are A3 and S5, which are brand new products of Airwheel intelligent scooters , combining the brilliant characters of its predecessors with the latest high technology. # # #
